articles.title: New technique rapidly tracks cell state changes through density measurements
articles.description: Measuring the density of a cell can reveal a great deal about the cell's state. As cells proliferate, differentiate, or undergo cell death, they may gain or lose water and other molecules, which is revealed by changes in density.

articles.title: Google brings ads to AI search in ChatGPT battle
articles.description: [SAN FRANCISCO] Google said on Wednesday it is beginning to weave advertisements into its new AI Mode for online search, a strategic move to counter the challenge posed by ChatGPT as the primary source for online answers.
